incidents.name: Unable to launch Analyze and Dashboard View on Twilio Flex

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have pinpointed the issue affecting the launch of Analyze and Dashboard View, and they are currently working with their vendor to fix it. We anticipate providing another update within 4 hours or as soon as additional information becomes available.
We are investigating a service interruption with Analyze and Dashboard View on Twilio Flex. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are seeing issues with Twilio Flex where subset of customers are Unable to launch Analyze and Dashboard View on Twilio Flex.Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Super SIM Over the Air Update Delays

incident_updates.body: We have identified a fix for the issue that is preventing some Super SIMs from successfully updating to their latest settings via over-the-air (OTA) updates. The fix needs to be implemented at one of our downstream partners, who expect to begin releasing the update to impacted SIMs around 4pm UTC tomorrow, February 7th. Afterwards, we expect to see fewer OTA updates failing to complete despite multiple attempts to contact the OTA service. Please note that it may take more than one attempt for a SIM to complete the OTA update procedure as there may be occasional failures or updates may need to be downloaded in multiple parts. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing Super SIM Over the Air (OTA) update failures for some SIM cards. The issue is preventing Super SIMs from retrieving their latest OTA setting and optimizing connectivity for devices. We've identified a fix which will be going into testing as soon as possible. We will provide an update on Tuesday with the status of our fix.

We are experiencing Super SIM Over the Air (OTA) update failures for some SIM cards. The issue is preventing Super SIMs from retrieving their latest OTA setting and optimizing connectivity for devices. Our engineering team is actively working with the affected service provider to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or sooner once more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Super SIM. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

05 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 05 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
